Title: The Creator
Plot: Amid a future war between the human race and the forces of artificial intelligence, a hardened ex-special forces agent grieving the disappearance of his wife, is recruited to hunt down and kill the Creator, the elusive architect of advanced AI who has developed a mysterious weapon with the power to end the war—and mankind itself.
Tagline: This is a fight for our very existence.
Stars: John David Washington, Madeleine Yuna Voyles, Gemma Chan
